content: *achieve easy going elegance with this unstructured chenille thick and quick vest the crochet version is single crochet and seamed at the sides and shoulders lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 10077 skill beginner size small medium large 1x finished chest measurement 42 46 52 57 inches chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* 400-500 yards *super bulky weight yarn may be substituted* decorative clasp pieces left front right front back *lion brand photo pictures the knit version * *pdf download provides both knit & crochet directions schematics* see divine weekend vest knit 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/divine-weekend-vest-knit
